description: People on the Clipper from Portsmouth left the port without screening, the government confirms.
title: Coronavirus: Jersey ferry passengers not tested on arrival
title_page: Coronavirus: Jersey ferry passengers not tested on arrival - BBC News
maintext: A spokesperson for the States said: "We have contacted all Clipper passengers to ensure they have an appointment or are self-isolating for 14 days, and are reviewing the future process with Ports of Jersey and Condor to return the Clipper arrival service to essential travellers only."
